name: PregnancyBundleHCPCS
title: Pregnancy Bundle HCPCS
description: For Contraceptive eCQMs Approval for Trial Use application in Spring 2022; This set of values contains codes indicating visits that are part of prenatal bundled care.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods among females ages 15-44),(Data Element Scope: Codes indicating visits that are part of prenatal bundled care),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes indicating visits that are part of prenatal bundled care),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes General Prenatal Visits Grouping value set and Prenatal Specific Visits Grouping value set)

concept.display: Prenatal care, at-risk enhanced service package (includes h1001-h1004)

contains.display: Prenatal care, at-risk enhanced service package (includes h1001-h1004)
